S04bsu025_u:2_0: atha te tīrthikā upalambhadṛṣṭayaḥ savikalpāḥ savitarkā mahāyānikamupasṛtya sādarakṛtāñjalipuṭā
S04bsu025_u:2_1: nairātmyapraśnaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - nairātmakaṃ śarīramiti kulaputra sarvajñena nirdiśyate /
S04bsu025_u:6: tadasmākaṃ saṃdehaṃ mocayitumarhati bhagavān - kimasti śarīre paramātmā,
S04bsu025_u:13: yadyasti, tatkathaṃ mārṣāḥ keśanakhadantacarmaromasirāmāṃsāsthimedamajjāsnāyuplīhāntranālaśiraḥkaracaraṇāṅgasakalaśarīre sa bāhyābhyantare vicāryamāṇe na dṛśyate paramātmā?
S04bsu025_u:14: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - na dṛśyate kulaputra paramātmā /
S04bsu025_u:17: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣā divyacakṣuṣo 'pi paśyanti /
S04bsu025_u:18: yasya na varṇo na rūpaṃ na saṃskāraḥ,
S04bsu025_u:25: tīrthikāḥ prāhuḥ - yadi kulaputra nocyate astīti vā nāstīti vā,
S04bsu025_u:27: mahāyānikāḥ prāhuḥ - na mārṣāḥ kiṃcidālambanaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu025_u:41: punaraparaṃ dvau bhedau vinirdiṣṭau yaduta saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca /
S04bsu025_u:44: evaṃ jīvaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalaḥ kārakaḥ vedakaḥ /
S04bsu025_u:48: evaṃ na jīvo na pudgalaḥ na puruṣaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na dhanaṃ - - - - - sā madhyamā pratipattirdharmāṇām /
S04bsu025_u:56: muktimārgaṃ na paśyanti andhā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ /
S04bsu025_u:59: paramārthaṃ na jānanti bhavo yatra nirudhyate /
S04bsu025_u:62: bhavaṃ cyutiṃ tathā loke punarāyānti yānti ca // 6 //
S04bsu025_u:66: cyutirasti ca sarveṣāṃ tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 8 //
S04bsu025_u:68: punaste narakaṃ yānti tatsarvaṃ saṃvṛteḥ phalam // 9 //
S04bsu025_u:75: na kāṭhinyaṃ na ca mṛdutvaṃ na coṣṇaṃ naiva śītalam /
S04bsu025_u:76: na saṃsparśaṃ na ca grāhyaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 13 //
S04bsu025_u:77: na dīrghaṃ nāpi vā hrasvaṃ na piṇḍaṃ na trikoṇakam /
S04bsu025_u:78: na kṛśaṃ nāpi na sthūlaṃ bodhicittasya lakṣaṇam // 14 // (#
S04bsu025_u:80: na śveta nāpi raktaṃ ca na kṛṣṇaṃ na ca pītakam /
S04bsu025_u:88: sarvaṃ ca tena sādṛśyaṃ niḥsāraṃ budbudopamam /
S04bsu025_u:92: abhrāntare yathā vidyut kṣaṇādapi na dṛśyate /
S04bsu025_u:94: krīḍitaṃ hasitaṃ nityaṃ jalpitaṃ ruditaṃ tathā /
S04bsu025_u:95: nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ tathā vādyaṃ sarvaṃ svapnopamaṃ hi tat // 22 //
S04bsu025_u:97: svapnaṃ ca cittasaṃkalpaṃ cittaṃ ca gaganopamam // 23 //
S04bsu025_u:99: sa sa rvapāpanirmuktaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // 24 //
S04bsu025_u:104: atha te tīrthikāstuṣṭā vikalparahitāstadā bhāvanāṃ samādhāya mahāyānayajñalābhino 'bhūvanniti //
